duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional customer service by answering inbound calls and addressing customer inquiries and concerns.
Demonstrate empathy and understanding while assisting customers and finding solutions to their problems.
Effectively multitask while managing customer requests and navigating computer systems to provide accurate information.
Adhere to company policies and procedures while addressing customer needs and maintaining high-quality service standards.
Collaborate with team members to ensure consistent and efficient customer support across all communication channels.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Associate's degree preferred)
